properties.description: Soul of the Junction SCIO provides Warm Welcome Spaces across our Community Hall and our Wooden Hut (behind the old Station Hotel) in Carstairs Junction. Come in for a warm, relaxed environment, hot drinks, friendly faces and informal community connection. Open to all ages – whether you’d like a quiet sit-down, a chat, or a supportive place to pause. A friendly, welcoming warm space run by Soul of the Junction SCIO in Carstairs Junction. Our Community Hall and Wooden Hut offer a safe place to sit, chat and connect, with hot drinks and a warm welcome for everyone. Pop in for a cuppa, community support, and a bit of company – you don’t need to book.Drop in for a cuppa, a cosy seat, and friendly conversation. Open to all – no booking needed.
properties.title: Community Centre and Wooden Hut

properties.address: Forth Community Resource Centre, 57 Hawkwood Terrace, Forth, South Lanarkshire ML11 8AT
properties.description: Bite and Blether sessions; Practical assistance and support; Free access to Wifi and computers; Free SIM cards; Charging point for mobiles; Help with welfare and IT enquiries; Emergency food and hygiene boxes; Someone to listen.
properties.title: Forth Community Resource Centre SG
